content.text: Hello Tom, I'm Eric. How are you today?
I'm doing great, thank you for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to build models of sports cars. I also like to spend time with my family and read.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read as well. What's your favorite book that you've read lately?
My favorite book that I've read lately is Middlesex. It's a really interesting book about a person who is born intersex.
That sounds like an interesting book. I'll have to check it out. What do you like about building models of sports cars?
I love the challenge of it and the satisfaction of seeing a finished product. I also like the creativity involved in designing and painting the models.
That sounds really cool! I'm not very artistic, so I'm not sure if I would be good at it.
It's not as hard as it looks! You can start out with a simple model and work your way up.
That's good to know. Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
I'm sure you'd be great at it
